creditline: Gift of Ms. Sheryl R. Johnson, wife of artist Paul Lamantia
description: busy, colorful layered image rendered in multicolored pigments; orange box with black drawings with an eyeball protruding out of the right side of box in top left edge of image; series of curving blue lines in ULC; long, slender abstracted face with open red mouth and sharp teeth in LRC; two orange triangles with red outlines in center right
inscription: on back, in bottom right, in black ink: #22 {circled} | \"TRANSMUTATIONS\" | MIXED MEDIUM | 1969 {circled} | w. 30 1/16 x L 42\"
medium: Gouache, black ink marker, pen and black ink, pen and blue ink, graphite, and collage on paper
provenance: The artist, Chicago; Sheryl R. Johnson, Chicago (wife of the artist); given to MIA, 2018.
signed: on back, in bottom right, in black ink: PAUL LAMANTIA {circled}
title: Transmutations
